1.name: 12 Angry Men
1.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

2.name: Ten Thousand Bedrooms
2.description: In this musical-comedy, Dean Martin plays an American hotel mogul who becomes smitten with a young Italian woman (Anna Maria Alberghetti) when buying a hotel in Rome. To marry this gal, he has to get her three older sisters married off.

3.name: Det sjunde inseglet
3.description: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

4.name: The Three Faces of Eve
4.description: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

5.name: The Young Stranger
5.description: When a 16-year-old, neglected by his movie producer father, gets in trouble, his father doesn't believe his claim of self-defense.

6.name: Paths of Glory
6.description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

7.name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
7.description: After settling his differences with a Japanese P.O.W. camp commander, a British Colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors, while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

8.name: The Cyclops
8.description: An expedition to Mexico finds and does battle with a mutated 25-foot man with one big eye.

9.name: Witness for the Prosecution
9.description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

10.name: Smultronstället
10.description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

11.name: Old Yeller
11.description: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

12.name: An Affair to Remember
12.description: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

13.name: Funny Face
13.description: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

14.name: Hell Drivers
14.description: Ex-con trucker tries to expose his boss' rackets.

15.name: Night of the Demon
15.description: American professor John Holden arrives in London for a parapsychology conference, only to find himself investigating the mysterious actions of Devil-worshiper Julian Karswell.

16.name: Kumonosu-jô
16.description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

17.name: The Curse of Frankenstein
17.description: Victor Frankenstein builds a creature and brings it to life, but it behaves not as he intended.

18.name: Le notti di Cabiria
18.description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

19.name: The Pride and the Passion
19.description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a British captain is sent to Spain to help prevent the French from stealing a powerful cannon.

20.name: The Prince and the Showgirl
20.description: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

21.name: The Girl Most Likely
21.description: Dodie dreams of marrying a millionaire so that she can live 'the life'. Buzz, her boyfriend, however is not rich as he is a salesman for a housing development. He proposes and Dodie accepts...                See full summary »

22.name: Run of the Arrow
22.description: When the South loses the war, Confederate veteran O'Meara goes West, joins the Sioux, takes a wife and refuses to be an American but he must choose a side when the Sioux go to war against the U.S. Army.

23.name: Night Passage
23.description: A fired railroad man is re-hired and trusted to carry a ten thousand dollar payroll in secret, even though he is suspected of being connected to outlaws.

24.name: Sweet Smell of Success
24.description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

25.name: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
25.description: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

26.name: Love in the Afternoon
26.description: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

27.name: A Face in the Crowd
27.description: An Arkansas drifter becomes an overnight media sensation. As he becomes drunk with fame and power, will he ever be exposed as the fraud he has become?

28.name: High Flight
28.description: The Commanding Officer of an RAF Training School must deal with a difficult cadet, but the cadet reminds the C.O. of himself when young.

29.name: The Incredible Shrinking Man
29.description: When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

30.name: The Black Scorpion
30.description: Volcanic activity frees giant scorpions from the earth who wreak havoc in the rural countryside and eventually threaten Mexico City.

31.name: Sayonara
31.description: A US Air Force major in Kobe confronts his own opposition to marriages between American servicemen and Japanese women when he falls for a beautiful performer.

32.name: Das singende, klingende Bäumchen
32.description: A brave prince wants to win the heart of a stubborn princess by finding the singing, ringing tree for her. He finally locates it in the magical realm of an evil dwarf who offers him a deal:...                See full summary »

33.name: Letyat zhuravli
33.description: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

34.name: The Tall Stranger
34.description: Back from the Civil War, an ex-Yankee officer aids a wagon train of former Confederates settle in a prosperous valley marred by cattle-rustling and land-grabbing feuds.

35.name: 3:10 to Yuma
35.description: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

36.name: Pal Joey
36.description: Joey Evans' a charming, handsome, funny, talented a-1st class, A-N°.1... heel. When Joey meets the former chorus girl ("she used to be 'Vera...with the vanishing veils'") and now is the ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Shiralee
37.description: When Jim Macauley finds his wife with another man, he takes their young daughter and they hit the road. With a young child as his responsibility, he finds he can't be quite the fancy-free ...                See full summary »

38.name: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
38.description: A hypnotherapist uses a temperamental teenager as guinea pig for a serum which transforms him into a vicious werewolf.

39.name: Peyton Place
39.description: A peaceful New England town hides secrets and scandals.

40.name: A Farewell to Arms
40.description: An English nurse and an American soldier on the Italian front during World War I fall in love, but the horrors surrounding them test their romance to the limit.

41.name: Charmants Garçons
41.description: Glamorous French night-club singer plays the field of male admirers.

42.name: Raintree County
42.description: A student falls in love with a Southern belle, but their relationship is complicated by her troubled past and the onset of the Civil War.

43.name: The Tall T
43.description: An independent former ranch foreman is kidnapped along with an heiress, who is being held for ransom by trio of ruthless outlaws.

44.name: Zero Hour!
44.description: In 1950s Canada, during a commercial flight, the pilots and some passengers suffer food poisoning, thus forcing an ex-WW2 fighter pilot to try to land the airliner in heavy fog.

45.name: Jailhouse Rock
45.description: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

46.name: The Living Idol
46.description: Several mysterious deaths are attributed to an ancient stone idol.

47.name: Tammy and the Bachelor
47.description: An unsophisticated young woman from the Mississippi swamps falls in love with an unconventional southern gentleman.

48.name: The Enemy Below
48.description: During World War II, an American destroyer meets a German U-Boat. Both captains are experts, and so begins a deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

49.name: A King in New York
49.description: A recently-deposed European monarch seeks shelter in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity and is later wrongly accused of being a Communist.

50.name: The Pajama Game
50.description: An Iowa pajama factory worker falls in love with an affable superintendent who had been hired by the factory's boss to help oppose the workers' demand for a pay raise.
